PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 1996-15181996-10-010,  CITIZENSHIP,  ,  , 
PrecisRe-appointment of SAMUEL BERMAN, of Toronto, Ontario, as a full-time member of the Convention Refugee Determination Division of the Immigration and Refugee Board (Toronto Regional Office), to hold office during good behaviour for a term of five years, effective January 1, 1997.
